oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jackson family Bible
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is the family Bible of General Alfred Eugene Jackson. The pages shown show the births and deaths of the family members. General Jackson served in the Confederate Army. The Bible was published in 1854 in New York by the American Bible Society. General Jackson served in the Department of East Tenn. and Southwest Virginia primarily fighting guerrillas, guarding rail lines, or protecting the vital salt works at Saltville, Va.
